All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
ColorTheme
The ColorTheme class which deals with changing and setting the views color theme between light, dark, and random colors.
Episode
Episode class to store all information necessary for an episode including url to download the mp3 file and image, and the title and author of the episode.
Podcast
The podcast object class, which is mainly a container for a grouping of episodes that make up that podcast.
PodcastController
The controller of the Podcast Manager application, which serves as the link between the GUI view that allows for user interaction, and the model the stores the necessary information about the files the view can display.
PodcastMain
The main class of the Podcast Manager application that loads the view to allow the user to see and interact with the application.
PodcastModel
The model of the Podcast Manager application that handles the bulk of work dealing with the managing of files, and their settings.
ViewUIMain
The view class which deals with displaying all elements of the podcast manager, collecting a users input to the GUI, and calling the appropriate methods to handle those interactions, allowing the user to interact with the program.
